parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mines

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets ownership over a remotely detonatable mine to the unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[addOwnedMine]] mine

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mine: [[Object]] - the mine object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addOwnedMine]] _superMine;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allMines]], [[createMine]], [[detectedMines]], [[mineActive]], [[getAllOwnedMines]], [[removeOwnedMine]], [[removeAllOwnedMines]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
